overview: Welcome to TMSleaze, a XXX parody of the television show, TMZ. We turn up the heat and the humor as you get to see what your favorite celebrities might look like when engaged in some uncensored hardcore humping! Britney Spears, Jessica Simpson and Tony Romo, Eminem and Lindsay Lohan, American Idol Personalities Paula Abdul, Simon Cowell and Ryan Seacrest, Mel Gibson, Spencer Pratt, and Heidi Montag are all lampooned in this no-holds-barred Sextravaganza! As a bonus, we`ve also incorporated several hilarious non-sex scenes that spoof Amy Winehouse, Nicolette Sheridan, and Janice Dickinson. With a (non-sex) appearance by Ron Jeremy, you can`t go wrong!
title: TMSleaze
